snippet: Deborah Hay’s “As Holy Sites Go/duet,” part of the Danspace Judson Now series, was performed at St. Mark’s Church on Thursday evening.
abstract: Alastair Macaulay reviews Deborah Hay dance piece As Holy Sites Go/duet, performed by Deborah Hay Dance Company at Danspace Project as part of the Danspace Judson Now series.
lead_paragraph: Deborah Hay’s “As Holy Sites Go/duet,” part of the Danspace Judson Now series, was performed at St. Mark’s Church on Thursday evening.

headline.seo: Deborah Hay Dance Company at St. Mark’s Church
headline.main: Moves of a New Breed, in a Habitat of Its Own
headline.print_headline: Moves of a New Breed, in a Habitat of Its Own
